com.googlecode.transmuter.util
Class ReflectionUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.transmuter.util.ReflectionUtils

public final class ReflectionUtils
extends Object

Contains utility methods for common reflection operations. This class is not meant to be inherited from or instantiated.

Author:
Humberto S. N. dos Anjos

Method Detail

simpleMethodToString

public static String simpleMethodToString(Method method)
Returns a simplified string representation of the given method.

Parameters:
method - a method object.
Returns:
a simplified string representation of the given method, or the string "<null>" if the given method is null.

getTypeName

public static String getTypeName(Type type)
Returns a simple string representation for the given type.

Parameters:
type - a type object.
Returns:
a simple string representation of type, which is:
  • the string "null", if type is null;
  • the type's name, if type is a Class object;
  • the type's name followed by the necessary []s, if type is a Class object representing an array;
  • the result of type's toString method otherwise.

getTypeNames

public static String[] getTypeNames(Type... types)
Translates the array of types received into an array of Strings holding the types' names.

Parameters:
types - several type objects.
Returns:
an array of Strings holding the types' names. This array has length 0 if the given array of types is empty.
See Also:
getTypeName(Type), ObjectUtils.isEmpty(Object...)

isCompatible

public static boolean isCompatible(Method method,
                                   Type type)
Checks if the given type is a subtype of the given method's declaring class.

Parameters:
method - a method object.
type - a type object.
Returns:
true if ownerType is a subtype of method's declaring class.
